item.title: marketization_of_scientific_research
item.description: We gives five caracteristics of the marketization and industrialisation of research. Exogeous cause prevail on endogeous one When Polanyi ( Polanyi1962) emphasizes that the “continued existence” of Science depends on its “self-renewal”, he points to the fact that the research entreprise for societies does not need an exogeous cause to evolve.
